name: attadia-monorepo
description: Attadia Monorepo - Atta, Foco, Pulso Apps

scripts.dev:legacy: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=apps/foco" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/atta" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/pulso" "npm run dev --workspace=apps/backend"
scripts.build:legacy: npm run build:shared && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:shared: npm run build --workspace=apps/shared || echo 'Shared build skipped - no build script'
scripts.build:apps: npm run build --workspace=apps/foco && npm run build --workspace=apps/atta && npm run build --workspace=apps/pulso
